HomePage.whoAmI: I am Amir Hossein Banaei, a front-end and back-end developer. I was born in 2006 and started my journey in programming in February 2021. From July 2021, I began seriously focusing on front-end development. After gaining two years of experience in front-end, I also ventured into back-end development. Currently, I work as a freelancer in both fields.
